item.title: Runescape revenge
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:16, topic:428068”]I’m really sick of people saying “omg it be my first serber no hate pls kthx”

If you don’t get criticism on what you did wrong, you’ll never improve on it. You also shouldn’t be afraid of what teenagers over the web think of you, I’m on allot of hate lists for spamming forums of bad servers with pictures.[/quote]

This. Also, all you did was move objects and spawn NPC’s… that doesn’t qualify for a release.

Read full topic
